element-2.label: NTC - Element 2
element-2.description: Radio Rules and Regulations - Amateur Radio Examination Reviuwer for Class C

questions.question: On November 11, 1931, what law did the Philippine Legislature enact which is known as the Radio Control Law of the Philippines?

What is the government agency which grants permits for the use of radio frequencies for wireless telephone and telegraph systems and radio communication systems including amateur radio stations and radio television broadcasting systems?

options.label: Commission on Information and Communications Technology

questions.question: What is the United Nations agency based in Geneva, Switzerland which coordinates the global use of the radio spectrum?
The Philippines is under what ITU region?
Who is eligible to use the amateur frequency bands allocated by the rules and regulations governing the Amateur Radio Service in this country?

options.label: Any person who is a Filipino citizen
Any person with a registered transceiver

questions.question: What is the maximum effectivity period of license NTC may issue to a new qualified applicant or for renewal of license with appropriate applications submitted?
When should the application of renewal of the amateur license be filed before expiration?

An expired license of not less than how many years may be renewed upon filing of renewal application and payment to NTC of the prescribed fees and surcharges with no requirement to retake the examinations and retaining the assigned call sign?

After how many years may an expired license be renewed; subject to the payment of fees and surcharges and the assignment of a different call sign from that of the former license without retaking the examination?

options.label: more than 2 years but less than 5 years
more than 3 years but less than 5 years
more than 4 years but less than 5 years

questions.question: What may an amateur, whose license has expired for more than 5 years, do to become licensed again (subject to the assignment of a different call sign?

options.label: Apply for renewal and pay prescribed fees and surcharges to NTC
Pass the appropriate examination and pay surcharges for every year expired to NTC
Pass the appropriate examination and pay prescribed fees for a new license to NTC

questions.question: What type of modification of the amateur license can be filed with the NTC?

options.label: Upgrading to a higher class of license
Transfer of location of the fixed station
Installation of additional or change of transmitter/transceiver

questions.question: What application should be filed with the NTC when an amateur license has been lost, mutilated or destroyed?

options.label: Certified True Copy of the license

questions.question: What do you call a requirement before an amateur radio license is renewed to show proof of his/her involvement in any amateur radio activities?
A Class C amateur shall be authorized to operate on HF fixed radio station with output power not exceeding how much on single sideband suppressed carrier?
What general subject is covered by Element 3 for the Class C examination?
16. A Class C amateur shall be authorized to operate on HF fixed radio station with an output power not exceeding how much on CW?
What frequency range on the 2-meter VHF can be used by amateurs in the Philippines?
What frequency range on the 40-meter HF can be used by amateurs in the Philippines?
What frequency range on the 15-meter HF can be used by amateurs in the Philippines?
A Class C amateur radio license is also known as?
What rating must a candidate obtain to pass the written examination provided that a rating of not less than 50% is received for any of the prescribed elements?
What is the distinctive identification carried by all transmissions in the amateur radio service consisting of numbers and letters assigned by NTC?
A Class B amateur license is also known as  ?
On what month does the expiration of a license issued by NTC fall, except those with lifetime privileges?

options.label: Same month when it was first issued

questions.question: What is the distinctive identification carried by all transmissions in the amateur radio service consisting of numbers and letters assigned by NTC?
How many classes of amateurs are there in the Philippines?
The Technician Class is also known as ?
If a Class C amateur passes the examination for an upgrade to Class B, how does he effect the upgrade in his license?
How should frequency bands allocated to a particular class of amateurs be used by duly authorized amateurs?
To facilitate the reception of distress calls using the emergency frequency on 2 meters, transmissions should be kept to a minimum and for how long?
What should an amateur without distress traffic do on the emergency frequency on 2 meters to make sure no distress traffic is taking place?

options.label: Listen for a reasonable period before transmitting

questions.question: When is a citizen of another country qualified to take the examination and apply for an amateur license here?

options.label: After he has attended a seminar and submitted the requirements
After submission of his passport copy
When his country extends the same privilege to Filipino nationals as far as examination is concerned
When he is endorsed by any Class A or an NTC accredited club

questions.question: Who in the Amateur Radio Service is called an amateur or an amateur radio operator?

options.label: A person who is capable of acquiring any equipment for his station to be used for communications
A person who broadcasts traffic for the general public
A person who needs to communicate with his family, co-workers and friends
A person interested in radio technique solely with a personal aim and without pecuniary interest

questions.question: A radio station in the amateur service installed at specified fixed location and operated to communicate with an amateur mobile station, amateur portable station or another amateur fixed radio station is an  ?
A radio station in the amateur service installed on board a vehicle or vessel and intended to be used while in motion or during halts at unspecified points is an ?
What is the amateur station so designed that it may conveniently be moved about from place to place or personally carried and be operated while in motion or during temporary halts?
What term means telecommunications by means of radio waves conducted by or among authorized amateurs on a non-commercial basis?
is defined as a radio communication service using space stations on earth satellites for the same purpose as those of the Amateur Radio Service?
is the general term applied to the use of radio waves?
is defined as a reasonably complete and sufficient combination of distinct radio equipment intended for or capable of being used either for transmission or reception of radio signals or both?

is a station with one or more transmitters, receivers or combination of transmitters or receivers including the accessory equipment authorized at a location for carrying on a radio communication service?
is the term for any transmission, emission and reception of signs, signals, writings, images and sounds or intelligence of any nature by wire, radio, optical or other electromagnetic systems?
Who is a Class A amateur duly appointed by the board of a club or association to supervise and control the proper use and operation of the fixed station of that association or club?
What is the distress signal for radiotelegraphy?
What is the distress signal for radiotelephony?
Into how many amateur radio districts is the Philippines divided?
Baguio City belongs to what amateur radio district?
Dumaguete City is under what amateur radio district?
Bicol is in what amateur radio district?
Batangas is under what amateur radio district?
What provinces belong to amateur radio District 6?

options.label: Bukidnon, Davao del Sur, Surigao del Norte

questions.question: If an amateur with a DU1XX call sign drives to Baguio City for a day, how should he identify his mobile station when transmitting in radiotelephony?
If an amateur with a DU9XX call sign operates temporarily a portable station in Zamboanga for less than a month, how should he identify his station in radiotelephony?
Where should be the amateur Radio Station License placed in the radio station?

options.label: Posted at the back of the main door

questions.question: When is any person permitted to transmit by voice while operating the amateur station of a licensee?

options.label: When the licensee controls directly the entire operation in accordance with proper amateur practice
Anytime even in the absence of the licensee in a normal situation
Anytime using a different call sign from that of the licensee

questions.question: What is strictly prohibited under the Rules Governing Operation of Amateur Stations?

options.label: Operation without a valid amateur radio operator certificate or radio station license
Transmission with false or misleading identification
Transmission of messages or signals containing profane or indecent words or language

questions.question: What shall an amateur do upon knowing his station is causing harmful interference to the operation of any existing station?

options.label: Ignore the operation of the existing station

questions.question: What appropriate steps can the NTC take on the harmful interference caused by an amateur station?

options.label: Suspend the amateur station’s operation pending a satisfactory adjustment of the equipment
Limit the power of the working hours
Order the temporary closure in the event of continued interference

questions.question: For how long is a portable operation allowed in any other area without obtaining a specific authority?
What is required if a continuous portable operation exceeds four (4) months in any other area?

options.label: Station ID must always be transmitted with a “portable” + district number
The licensee must carry with him his original license at all times

questions.question: NTC may grant the authorization to install and operate a repeater to whom?

options.label: Only to duly recognized amateur associations, clubs or societies

questions.question: At least how many licensed members must a club have, as one of the requirements, to be accredited by the NTC?

An amateur who is a citizen or resident of a foreign country may be authorized to operate temporarily in the Philippines provided he is a holder of a license issued by their government and his country provides the same privilege to Filipino nationals. What do you call this partnership or arrangement on amateur licensing between two countries?
Which of the following is a ground for suspension/revocation of an amateur license?

options.label: Intentional harmful interfering or jamming of legitimate licensed radio stations
Engaging in amateur work without a valid license or performing said work in behalf of a licensed amateur without proper authority
Making any false statement in the application for license

questions.question: To secure a Class B amateur license, a registered Electronics and Communications Engineer shall be required to pass the examination for what element?
What element shall be required from a holder of a valid 1st /or 2nd class commercial radiotelegraph operator certificate to pass to secure a Class B amateur license?
What is DW, DV or DU in the formation of amateur call sign?
For an amateur call sign DU1ABC, what is the suffix?
Which one below is a valid amateur call sign in the Philippines?
How much shall NTC fine any person who had been found to have violated the law with illegal possession and illegal transmission of an amateur transceiver?

options.label: P2,000 and/or imprisonment of not more than 2 years for each and every offense

questions.question: How much shall NTC fine a firm, company, corporation or association found to have illegally purchased a base transceiver?
When shall an amateur make his station and documents available for NTC inspection?

options.label: Any time upon request by an NTC representative or inspector with a Mission Order
Anytime upon request by an official observer from the amateur community
Upon release of the initial station license

questions.question: In April 2011, NTC issued Memorandum Circular 04-03-2011 on some frequencies which shall be used at times of disasters and national emergencies. Which frequencies on 2m and 40m shall be used by amateurs as calling frequencies under this MC?
What is not among the frequency bands allocated to the Amateur Radio Service?
What document is issued by NTC authorizing possession of a radio transmitter or receiver?
What is a document is issued by NTC authorizing the holder to purchase a radio transmitter or transceivers.
What is required if a person wants to sell or transfer his transmitter or transceiver to another on a single transaction?

options.label: He must obtain a permit to own or possess a transmitter or transceiver from the NTC.
He must obtain a dealer's permit from the NTC.
He must obtain a permit to sell or transfer from the NTC.
He must provide the next owner a photocopy of his radio station license.

questions.question: What is the federation of national amateur radio societies worldwide which serves as the watchdog and spokesperson for the world Amateur Radio community in the international level, wherein the Philippines is under its Region 3?
What size of the call sign characters of the fixed amateur radio station shall be posted at the entrance to the premises?
What size of the call sign characters shall be posted on the windshield of a vehicle or vessel of a mobile station?
What size of the call sign characters shall be posted on the equipment itself for a portable station?
What is the coverage of Element IV for Class C examination?
DU1XX had transferred his fixed station to Pangasinan and after 4 months had his license modified. What should his new call sign be?
What document shall a duly accredited amateur club enter into with NTC for the management of its members in the proper use of the amateur frequency bands and prevention of harmful interference?
What are some provinces under amateur District 4?

options.label: Misamis Oriental, Agusan del Sur, Butuan

questions.question: What regions are under amateur District 8?
How does DU1XX operating temporarily for 30 days in Ilocos Sur identify his station?
Which Element is not prescribed for Class C examination?

If a Class C amateur applies for renewal of his license for another 3 years but is 14 months expired and the prescribed license fee is P144.00 per year, how much shall he pay NTC for his Radio Station License renewal excluding filing fee?
What do you call a radio station in the amateur service installed at a specified fixed location and operated to communicate with an amateur mobile station, portable station or other amateur stations?
In the amateur band, what kind of messages should not be transmitted?

options.label: Personal messages to another amateur radio operator

questions.question: To facilitate the reception of distress calls, all transmission on 145 MHz shall be kept to a minimum and shall not exceed how long?
The Philippines is divided into how many amateur radio districts?
How long must be a radio logbook be kept?
How long should a radio logbook with distress traffic be kept?
What is the combination of letters and numbers to identify a radio station known as?
What government agency is responsible for the regulation of the amateur radio service?
What is one of the frequencies of the emergency channel on the 2 meter band?
What is an amateur radio station intended to be used for operation during unspecified halts or while in motion?
What is the maximum number of letters in the suffix of a callsign does NTC issue?
